Translations.Text: sitakalina o grikalina bidesayatraya tadera nirapattara jan'ya.
Ata'eba tara e'i grhera prabhura upasana karuka
yini ksudhaya tadera ahara diyechena, ara bhaya-bhiti theke tadera nirapada rekhechena.
Tumi ki take dekhecha ye dharmakarmake pratyakhana kare
se to ai jana ye etimadera hamkiye deya
ara gariba-duhkhike kha'oyanora ksetre utsaha dekhaya na.
yara sbayam tadera namaya sanbandhe udasina
Sutaram tomara prabhura uddesye namaya adaya karo ebam kurabani karo.
